name: getTransactionsByAccountIdFiltered
description:
Retrieve a filtered list of transactions against an account. Recommended to use the v3 endpoint instead.
* `dateRangeFrom` - A millisecond epoch time specifying the date range start date.
* `dateRangeTo` - A millisecond epoch time specifying the date range end date.
* `searchKeyword` - Search term to filter by from the reference field (`myRef`).
* `transactionTypes` - One or more of the transaction types above. This field can be repeated multiple times to allow for multiple transaction types.
* `offset` - The page offset. Defaults to 0. This is the record number that the returned list will start at. E.g. offset = 40 and limit = 20 will return records 40 to 59.

ican.description: The ican of the account to retrieve

dateRangeFrom.description: A millisecond epoch time specifying the date range start date.

dateRangeTo.description: A millisecond epoch time specifying the date range end date.

searchKeyword.description: Search term to filter by from the reference field (`myRef`).

transactionTypes.description: One or more of the transaction types above. This field can be repeated multiple times to allow for multiple transaction types.

offset.description: The page offset. Defaults to 0. This is the record number that the returned list will start at. E.g. offset = 40 and limit = 20 will return records 40 to 59.

$ul: **dateRangeTo**: milisecond timestamp of date range to value.
**total**: The total number of card transactions in the list.
